summary: The customer contacted Contoso Wireless to report issues with their new phone. The agent gathered information from the customer such as the make and model of the phone, as well as the serial number. The agent determined that the issue may be a hardware or software issue, and offered to troubleshoot the device remotely or in person. The customer chose to do the troubleshooting remotely, and the agent offered to have one of their technical support agents access the device remotely and run diagnostic tests to determine what is causing the issue.
